body.name: REIBII 72" H Garage Shelving Heavy Duty Storage Shelves 2000LBS Adjustable 5 Tier Metal Storage Shelving for Garage Storage Shelving Unit for Warehouse Pantry Basement, 72"H x 35.5"W x 15.8"D Black
features: 【2000LBS Capacity Garage Storage Shelves Heavy Duty】REIBII heavy duty garage shelving has thickened steel legs. Made of high-quality metal frame+high-quality thicker boards,so each shelf can hold up to 400 lbs, with a total bearing capacity of 2000 lbs, which makes 5-tier garage shelving unit more stable, solid and more stuff can be stored.

【72 "H x 35.5 "W x 15.8" D Multipurpose storage shelves heavy duty】The garage shelves heavy duty shelving with perfect size is suitable for garage, pantry, closet, kitchen, warehouse, basement, living room, office, etc. The 5 tier metal shelf unit heavy duty not only expands your storage space, makes your home clean and orderly, is your best choice.

【Adjustable Garage Storage Shelving Unit to Meet Different Needs】You can use your imagination to customize your own space. Metal shelving for garage is designed with adjustable connectors. The height of each layer is not only adjustable by moving the crossbar up or down to meet the different heights of varied objects needed, but also divided one shelf into two individual shelves, the link is able to provide more stability.

【Easy Assemble within 10 minutes】The heavy duty metal shelving for garage adopts a special interlocking design to make it quickly assembled. To help you quickly assemble, we offer you a hammers and a pair of gloves. There is no nuts or bolts required, you can quickly assemble every stand alone sturdy shelves for storage within 10 minutes alone.

【Best Gift & Professional Support 】There are many parts in the package, Please tell us the first time if meet the case of missing parts and assembly. You don't have to worry about scratches on the floor of metal shelves rack, which is perfect choice for gift-giving or housewarming. If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to keep our customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best of the inexpensive options
reviews.reviewText: I've got about 1000 Lego sets stored in my basement, I keep on buying new ones, and my shelving needs keep growing. I just redid the entire basement with some new shelving units similar to this, and while they work fine, and hold everything without issue, they were more cheaply made. I may have saved 5 or 10 bucks per 5 shelf set, and you could tell the difference trying to get the shelving suports in their little tabs.THESE, on the other hand, are MUCH easier to assemble. None of this tab into slot junk. Their assembly process is so much easier and quicker. I had one of these done in half the time the same sized other set took me, simply due to the ease of placing the supports and thumping them in place with my rubber mallet.I only needed one of these, and I had assembled it, not as a single 5 shelf unit, but two units, with 2 shelves and 3 shelves respectively, and came back upstairs to write my review, and saw they're on a 13% discount. I don't really NEED more right now, but I bought two more sets anyway while they were on sale, since I know at SOME point I'm going to want more shelves again. May as well get these while they're costing less.Definitely will be my go-to for inexpensive shelving moving forward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dishonest Advertising. NOT Heavy Duty.
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is a light duty shelf at best.The metal used for it is a very thin gauge and easy to twist with your hand even.Easy to assemble, yet, attempting to pick up or move the shelf at all, it starts to fall apart.If you are to buy this shelf, Do not expect to store anything actually heavy on it.It may work for things that are light, but probably not a long time. Thank you china

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok but not heavy duty
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for indoor storage and eventually use in the garage. They are ok for indoor closet area and I like the solid shelf but I don't know that I'll use them in the garage. They are not as heavy duty as I anticipated. Putting them together is easy but the railings kept wanting to pop back out even after hitting them with the hammer. After getting it together it sways a little so I think if you want to use them in the lower configuration for heavier items they might be better but I am afraid of these suckers getting bumped in the wrong way and one of those railings coming back out. I almost wish they had some type of latch or bolt setup even though it's more to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Certainly not heavy duty, but half the price of similar shelving at Home Depot
reviews.reviewText: This storage shelf went together very easy ( I've assembled these before). This is NOT heavy duty, but at half the price of a similar shelf at Home Depot, this is a really good value! Be sure to load heavy items on the bottom and screw it to the wall and this set of shelves will more that do the job. Honestly, I am very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy--not for heavy duty storage
reviews.reviewText: The unit is touted as being easy to assemble alone in 10 minutes or less. It took me about 40 minutes during which time the cross bars came loose at the slightest movement. It is definitely better to have someone to hold pieces in place as you continue to add parts. Secondly the shelf boards are listed as heavy duty, extra thick. They are maybe 1/4 inch thick but probably more like 1/8 inch. I put it together 3 days ago and it is still sitting there empty because I am so disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mediocre at best. Good for light use!
reviews.reviewText: I made my decision to buy based on the description below, which I have now come to realize once assembling the product, that it is an optimistic description and not really factual."【2000LBS Capacity Garage Storage Shelves Heavy Duty】REIBII heavy duty garage shelving has thickened steel legs. Made of high-quality metal frame+high-quality thicker MDF boards(Density 760kg/m³),so each shelf can hold up to 400 lbs, with a total bearing capacity of 2000 lbs, which makes 5-tier garage shelving unit more stable, solid and more stuff can be stored."The supplied MDF board are not "thicker" at all at a 1/4" and too flexible. I do not think it will last 1-2 years without visible warping. There is no visible coating so if it gets wet, the board will deterioate quickly.The metal frame itself easily bends and twists! I would say it's probably 18-16 gauge metal. Overall, it well packaged but I would only target it for light use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars JUNK! DO NOT BUY!
reviews.reviewText: CHEAP GARAGE STORAGE RACKS, NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY AND/OR TIME!! Purchased two of these racks. First and foremost, these racks are junk, flimsy, and not durable....you get what you pay for here...Chinese pricing and clearly Chinese made... In addition, upon receiving the order and preparing for assembly I noticed one of the vertical metal pieces was missing (should have 8 total and I only received 7 - see picture). With that being said, I went to return the one rack, which was missing a vertical piece, and UPS wanted $72 for shipping the package back, based on size and total weight of box, I paid $75.75 for the item to begin with. Ultimately, with the cost to ship the incomplete item back, I decided to keep for spare parts (knowing the other complete one was cheap enough that it'll need to be replaced before it's a year old).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I had concerns...
reviews.reviewText: Upon receiving the shelf unit, I was concerned by the small size of the box and those concerns were further increased when I opened the box. The material seemed thin and flimsy, but against my better judgement I decided to assemble it. Once it was put together, it is actually quite strong, though not as strong as retail shelving, but still adequate enough for home use. I've got it fully loaded and on a level floor, it has no need for the wall attachments. I was surprised. I thought this was going to be a returned item, but I was wrong.
